```{r}
df = read.csv('precipitacionsbcn.csv')
```

```{r}
#Agafem els 10 últims anys de la base de dades
df = tail(df, 20)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
if(!require('ggridges')) install.packages('ggridges'); library(ggridges)


df_long = pivot_longer(df, cols=-Any, names_to="Mes", values_to='Pluja')
```

ggplot(df_long, aes(x = Pluja, y = factor(Any), fill=Mes))+

geom_density_ridges(scale = 2, alpha = 0.7) +

theme_minimal() +

labs(title = 'PLujes')

```{r}
ggplot(df_long, aes(x = Pluja, y = factor(Any), fill = factor(Any))) + 
  geom_density_ridges(scale = 2, alpha = 0.7) + 
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = 'Distribució de la pluja per any', 
       x = "Quantitat de pluja (mm)", 
       y = "Any") +
  theme(legend.position = 'none')
```
